sentences.en: A gentle effervescence fills the mouth, then gives way to all the grandeur of the Chardonnay.
sentences.cn: 柔和而活跃的气泡充盈口腔, 进而可品到莎当妮所有的浓郁特质.

sentences.en: He looks like cold but inside of him all is effervescence.
sentences.cn: 他本人也是个外表冷酷内心狂热的家伙.

sentences.en: He wrote about Gillespie's effervescence, magnetism and commitment.
sentences.cn: 他写到了吉莱斯皮的活泼、魅力和献身精神。

sentences.en: Here the wine, like buried treasure, ages and develops its special effervescence that is all - natural.
sentences.cn: 就象深埋在地下的宝藏一样, 香槟酒在地窖里熟化并形成其独特的、完全天然的发泡性能.

sentences.en: It is the bribe for living, the champagne of the blood, the effervescence of the ferment.
sentences.cn: 这是永生的贿赂, 血液的美酒, 酵素的沸腾.
